Why Do Men Grow Facial Hair. — “A man doesn’t grow a beard, the beard grows a man”. Among the typical secondary sex characteristics in males is facial hair growth. Beards can start appearing as early as fourteen years of age, or it can take a man until his early twenties, or even later.
